code:
import sys

def twoSum(nums, target):
    prevMap = {} # val : index
    for i, n in enumerate(nums):
        diff = target - n
        if diff in prevMap:
            return [prevMap[diff], i]
        prevMap[n] = i
    return []

# Read input from stdin
lines = sys.stdin.read().split()
if not lines:
    sys.exit(0)

target = int(lines[0])
nums = [int(x) for x in lines[1:]]

result = twoSum(nums, target)
print(result)
